sentence: CNN: For years, Herschel Walker has told the same inspiring story: that he graduated in the top 1% of his class at the University of Georgia.
title: candidate Walker claimed he graduated in the top 1% of his college class. He didn't

sentence: Still, several of his endorsed candidates have easily won their primaries including Herschel Walker, who faced little opposition in the primary for Georgia's Senate race, and other candidates running in heavily-conservative districts.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Lindell Claims Georgia Primaries 'Stolen' to Ding Trump Endorsement Cred
